ComicInfo.Title: Shattered Grid; The New Adventures of Blue Senturion & Ninjor
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Mighty Morphin Power Rangers and their allies prepare their final counterattack against Drakkon, as a new ally makes it through their world and Zordon makes a last-ditch call for help.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Jamal Campbell | 1 | Sub | Vintage Subscription Cover | Jordan Gibson | 2 | Var | 1:25 Color Spotlight Variant Cover (Pink Ranger) | Joana Lafuente & Carlos Villa | 3 | RE | San Diego Comic-Con 2018 Diamond Retailer Event Exclusive Variant Cover | Marcio Takara | Missing | Var | Hyperforce Variant Cover | Jordan Gibson | 4 |
